text: (Kumntu ngamnye), kukho (iingelosi) ngokulandelelana (kwazo) ngaphambili nangemva kwakhe. Ziyamlondoloza ngokoMyalelo ka-Allâh. Inene uAllâh Akayi kuyiguqula imeko yabantu ukuba nabo abayiguquli imeko yabo ngokwabo. Kodwa ukuba uAllâh Uthande ukuthoba isohlwayo ebantwini, akukho nto inokusibuyisa umva, yaye abayi kufumanamkhuseli ngaphandle kwaKhe
